title: Ugly in Philly? How do the Raiders get ready? Najee Harris; Randall Cobb; MVP Trivia
itunes:title: Ugly in Philly? How do the Raiders get ready? Najee Harris; Randall Cobb; MVP Trivia
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and DeAngelo Hall breakdown the Philadelphia Eagles chances in the NFC East and against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Thursday Night Football. Then the crew discusses how the Las Vegas Raiders players can move on from the Gruden disaster and win games; they get into mixed bag trivia MVP edition; and lastly, they talk with Pittsburgh Steelers running back, Najee Harris and Green Bay Packers wide receiver, Randall Cobb.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
